Text: *pant, pant*
Rose is in a dark passageway.

Blood still seeps from the wounds she had taken on
her back while fleeing. Though not overly deep, the
cuts are also decidedly not shallow.

Rose is focusing her magic on the injuries, doing the
bare minimum to treat them. But as time goes on,
the pain spreads and sapps her of strength.

Rose's mind has been busy even while keeping one eye
out for those after her.
(What should I have done back there...?)
(What was right, the best course of action...?)
His Majesty wishes to see you.
The door opens, and her father enters.
Now, Your Majesty.
Raise...your head...
It has been some time, my liege.
Rose looks up as she speaks.
What...?!
It has...been some...
...time.
Ro...
Father...!
Perv flashes a twisted smirk.
The servants laugh at her mockingly as well.

The moment she saw how changed her father...no, King
Oriana's eyes were, Rose had decided to do away with
Perv.

The rumors of Perv's dealings with the Cult, and those
of her father becoming a mindless puppet.
All that had once been hearsay had become truth.
Unfortunately... Rose had failed.
Princess Rose has lost her mind!

The servants' cries summon a stampede of footsteps.
Knights crowd into the room.
Perv survived, and Rose was forced to run.

(If I had settled things properly back there, all of
this could have been dealt with internally as an
issue of Orianan security.)

(I thought I had avoided a situation that would spark
trouble in other lands...specifically here in Midgar.)

The words Perv had shouted as Rose fled come back
to her.

Surrender before the Bushin Festival ends! Otherwise
I'll have your father kill one of the honored guests.
Grr...

If King Oriana were to murder a dignitary attending
the festival as Perv claimed the king will...
It would mean war.

(There had been nothing calm about my decision.
I was simply acting out of rage and panic...!)

Her father was not a particularly good ruler,
and Oriana was not a large kingdom.
Nevertheless...
(I want to protect them...!)
(I only have one father, one homeland...!)

(To the Cult, Perv is nothing more than a disposable
pawn...)

(Even if I slew him, their tendrils within our
kingdom would still run deep...)

(What is running away going to solve? I'm only harming
my fellow countrymen and making the matter worse...)
(And as for what comes next...)
(Perhaps I should turn myself in.)
(That would at least avoid a war...)
(And spare my father...)
The thought brings a tiny bit of relief to Rose.

But at the same time she is hit with pangs of sadness
and loss, as if she has lost something dear to her.
Rose pulls out a Tuna King wrapper from her pocket.

She had already eaten its contents, but it still
smells faintly of bread.
Will you believe in me, no matter what may come?
I will.
No, that's okay.
Take it. You should loosen up a bit.
(I'm sure Cid knows of what happened.)
(Please, keep believing in me...)
Tears begin to pour from her eyes, one after another.

(I want to dispose of Perv, bring back my father,
and then see that we are wed.)
(If there was such a kind future...)
Surely, that is all she could have ever dreamed.
Ungh...
A sharp pain shoots through Rose's chest.

She bares her chest to find it covered with dark
black bruises.

(But I am possessed... All of my dreams were doomed
from the very beginning...)
Just then Rose hears a soft noise.
She assumes it is the footsteps of her pursuers.

However, for footsteps, their sound is awfully gentle
and pleasing. She strains her ears and realizes
what she is hearing is a piano.
"Moonlight Sonata"...?

As a music aficionado, Rose knows the song. And now
here she is, listening to this melody that has become
famous even in Oriana, coming from somewhere up
ahead in the tunnels.
The playing is profoundly perfect...

as if the person at the keys had spent an entire
lifetime mastering this one song, living only to
play "Moonlight Sonata."

Rose walks in the direction of the music, as if
the moon's glow is guiding her.
